executable.title: FADTTSter
executable.description: This interface simplifies data processing when working with FADTTS. This interface enables the user not only to customize the data to process ( row data, subjects, covariates, ... ) but also to plot the outputs.

boolean.name: noGUI
boolean.description: If you do not need the GUI
boolean.label: No GUI

file.name: executables
file.description: Path of the XML file that contains the executables configuration
file.label: xml file

file.name: parameters
file.description: Path of the XML file that contains the parameters configuration
file.label: xml file
